content: Yes, "Her Body and Other Parties" is a highly acclaimed collection of short stories by Carmen Maria Machado, which was published in 2017. The book explores topics such as female desire, queer identity, gender roles, and body horror. The collection has been praised for its originality and the way it blends genres like horror, fantasy, and science fiction to create a distinctive and unsettling atmosphere. Some of its most well-known stories include "The Husband Stitch," "Especially Heinous," and "Eight Bites." The book was a finalist for the National Book Award, the Shirley Jackson Award, and the World Fantasy Award, and it won the Lambda Literary Award for Lesbian Fiction in 2018.
